constant.name: _MUSCLES_NONE_
constant.descr: Constant to switch off muscles

constant.name: _MUSCLES_SIMPLE_
constant.descr: Constant to use simple muscles

constant.name: _MUSCLES_3E_HILL_
constant.descr: Constant to use 3 element Hill-type muscle

constant.name: _LEG_MODEL_OFF_
constant.descr: Switch off a leg

constant.name: _LEG_MODEL_TLEM_
constant.descr: Switch to use leg model: "TLEM 1"

constant.name: _LEG_MODEL_TLEM1_
constant.descr: Switch to use leg model: "TLEM 1"

constant.name: _LEG_MODEL_TLEM2_
constant.descr: Switch to use leg model: "TLEM 2"

constant.name: _LEG_MODEL_Leg_
constant.descr: Switch to use leg model: "Leg"

constant.name: _LEG_MODEL_LEG_
constant.descr: Switch to use leg model: "Leg"

constant.name: _MORPH_NONE_
constant.descr: Constant for no-morphing between the upper and lower bodies.

constant.name: _MORPH_TRUNK_TO_LEG_
constant.descr: Constant for the trunk-to-leg morphing

constant.name: _MORPH_LEG_TO_TRUNK_
constant.descr: Constant for the leg-to-trunk morhping

constant.name: _PELVIS_DISPLAY_NONE_
constant.descr: Constant to switch off pelvis visualization

constant.name: _PELVIS_DISPLAY_LEGPELVIS_ONLY_
constant.descr: Constant to display leg-dependent pevlis only

constant.name: _PELVIS_DISPLAY_LEGANDTRUNKPELVIS_
constant.descr: Constant to display both trunk and leg pelvises

constant.name: _DISC_STIFFNESS_NONE_
constant.descr: Constant to switch off disc spring in the spine

constant.name: _DISC_STIFFNESS_LINEAR_
constant.descr: Constant to switch linear disc spring on in the spine

constant.name: _DISC_STIFFNESS_NONLINEAR_
constant.descr: Constant to switch nonlinear disc spring on in the spine

constant.name: _SCALING_CUSTOM_
constant.descr: Custom anthropometric scaling law for the entire model

constant.name: _SCALING_STANDARD_
constant.descr: Standard scaling law to be used by the entire model.

constant.name: _SCALING_UNIFORM_
constant.descr: Uniform anthropometric scaling law to be used by the entire model.

constant.name: _SCALING_LENGTHMASS_
constant.descr: Length/mass anthropometric scaling law to be used by the entire model.

constant.name: _SCALING_LENGTHMASSFAT_
constant.descr: Length/mass/fat anthropometric scaling law to be used by the entire model.

constant.name: _SCALING_UNIFORM_EXTMEASUREMENTS_
constant.descr: Uniform anthropometric scaling law with external measurements to be used by the entire model.

constant.name: _SCALING_LENGTHMASS_EXTMEASUREMENTS_
constant.descr: Length/mass anthropometric with external measurements scaling law to be used by the entire model.

constant.name: _SCALING_LENGTHMASSFAT_EXTMEASUREMENTS_
constant.descr: Length/mass/fat anthropometric with external measurements scaling law to be used by the entire model.

constant.name: _SCALING_LENGTHMASSFAT_MULTIDOFS_
constant.descr: Length/mass/fat anthropometric with for multiple degree of freedom.

constant.name: CONST_MUSCLES_NONE
constant.descr: Constant to switch off muscles

constant.name: CONST_MUSCLES_SIMPLE
constant.descr: Constant to use simple muscles

constant.name: CONST_MUSCLES_3E_HILL
constant.descr: Constant to use 3 element Hill-type muscle

constant.name: CONST_HAND_SIMPLE
constant.descr: Constant to use simplified hand model

constant.name: CONST_HAND_DETAILED
constant.descr: Constant to use detailed hand model

constant.name: CONST_LEG_MODEL_OFF
constant.descr: Switch off a leg

constant.name: CONST_LEG_MODEL_TLEM
constant.descr: Switch to use leg model: "TLEM 1"

constant.name: CONST_LEG_MODEL_TLEM2
constant.descr: Switch to use leg model: "TLEM 2"

constant.name: CONST_LEG_MODEL_Leg
constant.descr: Switch to use leg model: "Leg"

constant.name: CONST_MORPH_NONE
constant.descr: Constant for no-morphing between the upper and lower bodies.

constant.name: CONST_MORPH_TRUNK_TO_LEG
constant.descr: Constant for the trunk-to-leg morphing

constant.name: CONST_MORPH_LEG_TO_TRUNK
constant.descr: Constant for the leg-to-trunk morhping

constant.name: CONST_PELVIS_DISPLAY_NONE
constant.descr: Constant to switch off pelvis visualization

constant.name: CONST_PELVIS_DISPLAY_LEGPELVIS_ONLY
constant.descr: Constant to display leg-dependent pevlis only

constant.name: CONST_PELVIS_DISPLAY_LEGANDTRUNKPELVIS
constant.descr: Constant to display both trunk and leg pelvises

constant.name: CONST_DISC_STIFFNESS_NONE
constant.descr: Constant to switch off disc spring in the spine

constant.name: CONST_DISC_STIFFNESS_LINEAR
constant.descr: Constant to switch linear disc spring on in the spine

constant.name: CONST_DISC_STIFFNESS_NONLINEAR
constant.descr: Constant to switch nonlinear disc spring on in the spine

constant.name: CONST_SCALING_CUSTOM
constant.descr: Custom anthropometric scaling law for the entire model

constant.name: CONST_SCALING_STANDARD
constant.descr: Standard scaling law to be used by the entire model.

constant.name: CONST_SCALING_UNIFORM
constant.descr: Uniform anthropometric scaling law to be used by the entire model.

constant.name: CONST_SCALING_LENGTHMASS
constant.descr: Length/mass anthropometric scaling law to be used by the entire model.

constant.name: CONST_SCALING_LENGTHMASSFAT
constant.descr: Length/mass/fat anthropometric scaling law to be used by the entire model.

constant.name: CONST_SCALING_UNIFORM_EXTMEASUREMENTS
constant.descr: Uniform anthropometric scaling law with external measurements to be used by the entire model.

constant.name: CONST_SCALING_LENGTHMASS_EXTMEASUREMENTS
constant.descr: Length/mass anthropometric with external measurements scaling law to be used by the entire model.

constant.name: CONST_SCALING_LENGTHMASSFAT_EXTMEASUREMENTS
constant.descr: Length/mass/fat anthropometric with external measurements scaling law to be used by the entire model.

constant.name: CONST_SCALING_LENGTHMASSFAT_MULTIDOFS
constant.descr: Length/mass/fat anthropometric with for multiple degree of freedom.

parameter.name: BM_SCALING
parameter.descr: Definition of an anthropometric scaling law

parameter.name: BM_SCALING_ANTHRO_FILE
parameter.descr: File with all anthropometric measurements

parameter.name: BM_SCALING_MY_FILE
parameter.descr: Custom anthopometric scaling law, used when BM_SCALING is _SCALING_CUSTOM_.

parameter.name: BM_CONFIG_MESSAGES
parameter.descr: Switch for automatic display of all configuration values

parameter.name: BM_CONFIG_VALUES
parameter.descr: Switch for enabling configuration value information in the model tree

parameter.name: BM_DRAWSETTINGS_FILE
parameter.descr: A file with draw settings

parameter.name: BM_DRAWSETTINGS_SKIP
parameter.descr: A flag to switch on/off inclusion of the draw settings (may be needed in case of two human models)

parameter.name: BM_LEG_MODEL
parameter.descr: Parameter defining the Leg model used. This can be overridden per leg ``BM_LEG_LEFT`` and ``BM_LEG_RIGHT``

parameter.name: BM_LEG_LEFT
parameter.descr: Switch defining left leg model. Can be used to control the leg individually.

parameter.name: BM_LEG_RIGHT
parameter.descr: Switch defining left leg model. Can be used to control the leg individually.

parameter.name: BM_LEG_STRENGTH_INDEX
parameter.descr: Index parameter to specify muscle strength for lower extremities

parameter.name: BM_LEG_MUSCLES_BOTH
parameter.descr: Parameter to define muscle behavior of both right and left leg

parameter.name: BM_LEG_MUSCLES_LEFT
parameter.descr: Parameter to define muscle behavior of the left leg

parameter.name: BM_LEG_MUSCLES_RIGHT
parameter.descr: Parameter to define muscle behavior of the right leg

parameter.name: BM_LEG_DATASET
parameter.descr: Path to specify the underlying dataset. This currently only affects the TLEM based models. Valid options depends on which model (TLEM1/2) is used, and what dataset are available. If not specified, this will be configure automatically.

parameter.name: BM_LEG_MORPHOLOGY
parameter.descr: Parameter for the morphology method used by the Leg model. This currently only affects the TLEM based models.Valid options depends on which model (TLEM1/2) is used, and what dataset are available. If not specified, this will be configure automatically.

parameter.name: BM_TRUNK_DATASET
parameter.descr: Parameter to define a trunk model dataset.

parameter.name: BM_TRUNK_STRENGTH_INDEX
parameter.descr: Index parameter to specify strength for trunk muscles.

parameter.name: BM_TRUNK_MUSCLES
parameter.descr: Definition of the type of all spine muscles.

parameter.name: BM_TRUNK_LUMBAR_MUSCLES
parameter.descr: Definition of the lumbar spine muscles type.

parameter.name: BM_TRUNK_THORACIC_MUSCLES
parameter.descr: Definition of the thoracic spine muscles type.

parameter.name: BM_TRUNK_CERVICAL_MUSCLES
parameter.descr: Definition of the cervical spine muscles type.

parameter.name: BM_TRUNK_DISC_STIFNESS
parameter.descr: Definition of the disc model of all spine parts.

parameter.name: BM_TRUNK_LUMBAR_DISC_STIFNESS
parameter.descr: Definition of the lumbar spine disc model.

parameter.name: BM_TRUNK_THORACIC_DISC_STIFNESS
parameter.descr: Definition of the thoracic spine disc model.

parameter.name: BM_TRUNK_CERVICAL_DISC_STIFNESS
parameter.descr: Definition of the cervical spine disc model.

parameter.name: BM_TRUNK_RHYTHM
parameter.descr: A switch to use a kinematic rhythm for the whole spine.

parameter.name: BM_TRUNK_LUMBAR_RHYTHM
parameter.descr: A switch to use a kinematic rhythm for the lumbar spine.

parameter.name: BM_TRUNK_THORACIC_RHYTHM
parameter.descr: A switch to use a kinematic rhythm for the thoracic spine.

parameter.name: BM_TRUNK_CERVICAL_RHYTHM
parameter.descr: A switch to use a kinematic rhythm for the cervical spine.

parameter.name: BM_TRUNK_LIGAMENTS
parameter.descr: A switch to control all the ligaments in the spine.

parameter.name: BM_TRUNK_LUMBAR_LIGAMENTS
parameter.descr: A switch to control the lumbar spine ligaments.

parameter.name: BM_TRUNK_THORACIC_LIGAMENTS
parameter.descr: A switch to control the thoracic spine ligaments.

parameter.name: BM_TRUNK_CERVICAL_LIGAMENTS
parameter.descr: A switch to control the cervical spine ligaments.

parameter.name: BM_ARM_STRENGTH_INDEX
parameter.descr: Index parameter to specify muscle strength for upper extremities.

parameter.name: BM_ARM_LEFT
parameter.descr: Switch for the left arm model being present or not.

parameter.name: BM_ARM_DETAIL_HAND_LEFT
parameter.descr: Keyword for the type of left hand.

parameter.name: BM_ARM_SHOULDER_RHYTHM_LEFT
parameter.descr: Switch for the shoulder rhythm constraints for the left arm being present or not.

parameter.name: BM_ARM_RIGHT
parameter.descr: Switch for the right arm model being present or not.

parameter.name: BM_ARM_DETAIL_HAND_RIGHT
parameter.descr: Keyword for the type of right hand.

parameter.name: BM_ARM_SHOULDER_RHYTHM_RIGHT
parameter.descr: Switch for the shoulder rhythm constraints for the right arm being present or not.

parameter.name: BM_ARM_MUSCLES_BOTH
parameter.descr: Keyword for the muscle model type for both left and right arms.

parameter.name: BM_ARM_MUSCLES_LEFT
parameter.descr: Keyword for the muscle model type for the left arm.

parameter.name: BM_ARM_MUSCLES_RIGHT
parameter.descr: Keyword for the muscle model for both the right arm.

parameter.name: BM_BONY_LANDMARK_DEFINED_JOINTAXIS
parameter.descr: Keyword to choose the option of the joint axes defintion based on the anatomical landmarks.

parameter.name: BM_PELVIS_DISPLAY
parameter.descr: Keyword for pelvis display setting.

parameter.name: BM_MANNEQUIN_FILE
parameter.descr: File name of the mannequin definition file. Default is a file in the body model, but this can be copied to and modified in your model directory.

parameter.name: BM_MANNEQUIN_DRIVER_DEFAULT
parameter.descr: Setting of the default value for all mannequin drivers.

parameter.name: BM_MANNEQUIN_DRIVER_WEAK_SWITCH
parameter.descr: By default constraint type of mannequin drivers will be soft.

parameter.name: BM_MANNEQUIN_DRIVER_INDIVIDUAL_WEIGHTS
parameter.descr: Allows for individual weights if the BM mannequin drivers are soft. Weights are set by assigning the BM_MANNEQUIN_DRIVER_* switches a value instead of ON/OFF.

parameter.name: BM_LEG_TRUNK_INTERFACE
parameter.descr: Keyword for the interface morhping between the trunk and the leg pelvis segments.

parameter.name: BM_MANNEQUIN_DRIVER_PELVIS_POS_X
parameter.descr: Switch for the mannequin driver being active or not

parameter.name: BM_MANNEQUIN_DRIVER_PELVIS_POS_Y
parameter.descr: Switch for the mannequin driver being active or not

parameter.name: BM_MANNEQUIN_DRIVER_PELVIS_POS_Z
parameter.descr: Switch for the mannequin driver being active or not

parameter.name: BM_MANNEQUIN_DRIVER_PELVIS_ROT_Z
parameter.descr: Switch for the mannequin driver being active or not

parameter.name: BM_MANNEQUIN_DRIVER_PELVIS_ROT_Y
parameter.descr: Switch for the mannequin driver being active or not

parameter.name: BM_MANNEQUIN_DRIVER_PELVIS_ROT_X
parameter.descr: Switch for the mannequin driver being active or not

parameter.name: BM_MANNEQUIN_DRIVER_NECK
parameter.descr: Switch for the mannequin driver being active or not

parameter.name: BM_MANNEQUIN_DRIVER_PELVIS_THORAX_LATERAL_BENDING
parameter.descr: Switch for the mannequin driver being active or not

parameter.name: BM_MANNEQUIN_DRIVER_PELVIS_THORAX_ROTATION
parameter.descr: Switch for the mannequin driver being active or not

parameter.name: BM_MANNEQUIN_DRIVER_PELVIS_THORAX_EXTENSION
parameter.descr: Switch for the mannequin driver being active or not

parameter.name: BM_MANNEQUIN_DRIVER_STERNO_CLAVICULAR_RIGHT
parameter.descr: Switch for the mannequin driver being active or not

parameter.name: BM_MANNEQUIN_DRIVER_GLENOHUMERAL_ABDUCTION_RIGHT
parameter.descr: Switch for the mannequin driver being active or not

parameter.name: BM_MANNEQUIN_DRIVER_GLENOHUMERAL_FLEXION_RIGHT
parameter.descr: Switch for the mannequin driver being active or not

parameter.name: BM_MANNEQUIN_DRIVER_GLENOHUMERAL_EXTERNAL_ROTATION_RIGHT
parameter.descr: Switch for the mannequin driver being active or not

parameter.name: BM_MANNEQUIN_DRIVER_ELBOW_FLEXION_RIGHT
parameter.descr: Switch for the mannequin driver being active or not

parameter.name: BM_MANNEQUIN_DRIVER_ELBOW_PRONATION_RIGHT
parameter.descr: Switch for the mannequin driver being active or not

parameter.name: BM_MANNEQUIN_DRIVER_WRIST_FLEXION_RIGHT
parameter.descr: Switch for the mannequin driver being active or not

parameter.name: BM_MANNEQUIN_DRIVER_WRIST_ABDUCTION_RIGHT
parameter.descr: Switch for the mannequin driver being active or not

parameter.name: BM_MANNEQUIN_DRIVER_STERNO_CLAVICULAR_LEFT
parameter.descr: Switch for the mannequin driver being active or not

parameter.name: BM_MANNEQUIN_DRIVER_GLENOHUMERAL_ABDUCTION_LEFT
parameter.descr: Switch for the mannequin driver being active or not

parameter.name: BM_MANNEQUIN_DRIVER_GLENOHUMERAL_FLEXION_LEFT
parameter.descr: Switch for the mannequin driver being active or not

parameter.name: BM_MANNEQUIN_DRIVER_GLENOHUMERAL_EXTERNAL_ROTATION_LEFT
parameter.descr: Switch for the mannequin driver being active or not

parameter.name: BM_MANNEQUIN_DRIVER_ELBOW_PRONATION_LEFT

parameter.name: BM_MANNEQUIN_DRIVER_WRIST_ABDUCTION_LEFT

parameter.descr: Switch for the mannequin driver being active or not

parameter.name: BM_MANNEQUIN_DRIVER_HIP_EXTERNAL_ROTATION_RIGHT

parameter.name: BM_MANNEQUIN_DRIVER_HIP_ABDUCTION_RIGHT

parameter.name: BM_MANNEQUIN_DRIVER_KNEE_FLEXION_RIGHT

parameter.name: BM_GLOBAL_REFERENCE_FRAME_SWITCH
parameter.descr: A switch to use different ref. frame than the default global reference frame

parameter.name: BM_GLOBAL_REFERENCE_FRAME
parameter.descr: An object path leading to the selected global reference frame
